alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:14PM CDT until June 16 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Harrison County in southern Mississippi... Northwestern Jackson County in southern Mississippi... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 913 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles east of McHenry, or 16 miles southeast of Wiggins, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Latimer and Vancleave. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
